s.text: I put in the sound of cartilage being crunched and show the bright red blood pouring out of someone's nose, and I give you a close up of the other person's broken fingers beginning to swell.

Take Blockbuster, which prides itself on being a "family video store."
A director who frequently tangled with the ratings board told me an instructive story.
Yippee: another occasion for bashing the ratings board.
